ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of putting the raw materials of this planet to good use. This technology unlocks the ability to construct robust structures using metal bars and stone blocks. Also increases wall durability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in construction, unlock industrial heating and cooling solutions. Also unlocks conduit walls, and powered doors to speed your colonists along their merry way. Also increases wall durability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nothing says keep out like a steel reinforced door blocking your way. Continued advancement in construction unlocks the ability to secure your base with blast doors. Also increases wall durability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: They say home is where the heart is, and your heart is happiest among the stars! This unlocks the ability to construct a ship structural beam, so you can start down the path of leaving this filthy rock. Also increases wall durability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of crafting useful materials from this harsh environment. This unlocks the ability to grow cotton and devilstrand, and craft it into useful cloth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in crafting, unlock the ability to build powered crafting tables. They are faster, and more effective than their non-powered counterparts. Also unlocks additional furniture items and training devices your colonists may use.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Continued advancement in crafting, unlocks the ability to build the smithing table. With this you can create weapons and weaponized prosthetics. Also unlocks additional furniture items to beautify your colony.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Your injured colonists no longer have to accept the mediocrity of inferior prosthetics. This final advancement in crafting unlocks the ability to create your own bionic body parts. You can now be better, stronger, and faster, without having to sell your soul to the trade ships to get them!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting V
ResearchProjectDef.description: Metal Fabrication allows us to work with hitech alloys. Specifically using complex materials like Titanium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting VI
ResearchProjectDef.description: Matter Conversion allows us to build a matter converter and convert items and chunk into raw matter. Also allows us to create items from raw matter.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting VII
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced factorization the step in understanding the basics of advanced manufactoring methods, to give your colony access to the latest assembly machinery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of power generation to help your colonists survive in this harsh climate. This advancement unlocks conduits, lights, the steam generator, and the wind turbine. Also unlocked are the glassworks, cookstove, and items to assist with temperature control.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in power technology, give your colonists the ability to harness the power of the sun. Unlocks the solar powered generator. Also increases battery efficiency by 15 percent.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: What do you do when the sun doesn't shine? Solar power is great, except when it's dark! This advancement in power generation unlocks the geothermal generator that can harness the power of the planet! Also increases battery efficiency by 15 percent.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power V
ResearchProjectDef.description: Geothermal power is great, except when you can't find a steam vent! Advanced knowledge of power generation allows you to build a nuclear reactor. Also increases battery efficiency by 15 percent.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power VI
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows to build advanced power plants: Gauss wind turbine, thermoelectric generator and tesla generator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power VII
ResearchProjectDef.description: Open secrets of electromagnetics. Allows to build eco-friendly plasma generators.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power VIII
ResearchProjectDef.description: Dynamic Electromagnetics allows you to fabricate advanced buildings using electromagnetic components. This unlocks the upper teir of power generation and technology found in every Glitter world installation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power IX
ResearchProjectDef.description: The antimatter contained separate from the normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that nuclear reactors capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security: Basic defence
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learning the basics of security will allow your colonists to create sandbags and alarm system.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security: Incendiary IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build incendiary explosive traps from artillery shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security: Explosive IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build improvised explosive device-based traps from artillery shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security: Mortars
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sometimes, the best defence is a strong offense.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security: Advanced weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build advanced weapon table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security: Mechanoid weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build mechanoid weapon table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The art of relaxation I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Methods of obtaining pleasure. Tier 1.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The art of relaxation II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Methods of obtaining pleasure. Tier 2.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The art of relaxation III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Methods of obtaining pleasure. Tier 3.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The art of relaxation IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Methods of obtaining pleasure. Tier 4.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Base Structures III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock Reinforced structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Base Structures IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock Advanced Reinforcement structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Colored lights
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to construct colored lights, mostly used for decorative purposes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Communication station
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to construct communications station, so they may interact with other colonies and trade ships.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cremation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Minor Discovery: This allows colonists to build crematoriums, which can vaporize unwanted corpses and apparel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pneumatic picks
ResearchProjectDef.description: Miner's picks are 20% more effective.
